FAQ Assistant
Frequently Asked Questions
Basic Service Information
AI Call Assistant is a service where AI answers, records phone calls, voice, and messenger conversations, and automatically summarizes, stores, and analyzes call content.
It can be used in all situations requiring sales calls, customer service, contract negotiations, international calls, and call record management.
Yes. Through a virtual number, AI can directly receive calls and converse like a human.
Yes. When a user is on a call, AI simultaneously performs recording, summarization, and analysis.
If recording consent is enabled, all calls are automatically saved.
Call Recording & Summarization
Voice is converted to text in real-time and saved along with the original audio.
A 3-5 line summary of key points along with major agreements and action items are automatically organized.
Yes. The speaker separation feature distinguishes who said what.
Yes. It automatically analyzes emotional states such as anger, neutral, and satisfaction.
You can search with natural language like "last month's contract call".
AI Negotiation Assistant
It analyzes the other party's statements during calls and provides negotiation strategies, recommended phrases, and risk warnings.
No. Negotiation guides are displayed privately only to the user.
Yes. It comprehensively analyzes price, schedule, and conditions to suggest optimal alternatives.
Security & Legal
Automatic guidance messages are applied according to each country's recording laws.
All data is encrypted and stored.
It includes timestamps and hash values that can be used as evidence.
Pricing & Operations
Basic summarization features are provided in the free plan.
Customized plans are provided based on the number of users and features.
Yes. It provides consultation automation and quality management features.
After signing up, you can start using it immediately by creating a virtual number.
Contracts & Automation
Yes. Contract summaries or drafts can be generated based on call content.
Agreement content in calls is automatically extracted and matched with contract clauses.
Voice commands like "summarize this call and send via email" are possible.
It integrates with major CRMs such as Salesforce and HubSpot.
They can be automatically generated after calls end.
AI-to-AI Calls
Our company's AI and the other company's AI directly communicate to pre-coordinate conditions.
It's only possible within preset ranges, and human intervention is required for final approval.
Yes. Each AI can negotiate in real-time in different languages.
All AIâ†”AI calls are saved as voice, text, and agreement logs.
Multilingual & Global
Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, French, and more are supported.
Virtual numbers (DID) are provided by country.
Real-time translation during calls and translated summaries are available.
Contract success probability is provided in real-time during calls.
Yes. You can simulate negotiations with an AI counterpart before actual calls.
Yes. We comply with global privacy protection regulations.
